name: C4D Woo Compare
author: Coffee4dev.com

sections.description:
• Provide Compare Cart

  • Provide Compare Button by shortcode for product

  • Show compare products in modal box

Shortcode

  • [c4d-woo-compare-cart icon=”fa fa-retweet” label=”Your Text”]

  • [c4d-woo-compare-button icon=”fa fa-retweet” label=”Your Text”]

Arbitrary section 1
sections.installation:
From your WordPress dashboard

  1. Visit ‘Plugins > Add New’
  2. Search for ‘c4d woo compare
  3. Activate plugin from your Plugins page.

From WordPress.org

  1. Download Woo Category Product Perpage.
  2. Upload the ‘c4d-woo-compare directory to your ‘/wp-content/plugins/’ directory, using your favorite method (ftp, sftp, scp, etc…)
  3. Activate plugin from your Plugins page.
sections.faq:
Installation Instructions

From your WordPress dashboard

  1. Visit ‘Plugins > Add New’
  2. Search for ‘c4d woo compare
  3. Activate plugin from your Plugins page.
From WordPress.org
  1. Download Woo Category Product Perpage.
  2. Upload the ‘c4d-woo-compare directory to your ‘/wp-content/plugins/’ directory, using your favorite method (ftp, sftp, scp, etc…)
  3. Activate plugin from your Plugins page.
